title: Sampler
medium:
Medium:  cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique:  cross stitch embroidery on plain weave foundation
description: Sampler with red embroidery on a natural linen ground in three sections. The upper register has rows of alphabets. The middle register contains rows of geometric pattern bands, with a large squirrel in the center. The lower register contains spot motifs, including houses, vases and baskets of flowers, crosses, an anchor, bible, teapot, key, heart, ship, and animals, including an elephant between two palm trees.
name: Sampler
